description:
The help text of mockey_patch nova config option states that it turns the logging of monkey patching on and off. See:
https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/utils.py#L66

However the code use this config parameter to turn the monkey patching on and off. See: 
https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/utils.py#L720
title: monkey_patch config option has a wrong help message

comments.content:
The help text of mockey_patch nova config option states that it turns the logging of monkey patching on and off. See:
https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/utils.py#L66

However the code use this config parameter to turn the monkey patching on and off. See: 
https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/utils.py#L720
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~balazs-gibizer

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/219722
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/219722
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=5959f7fcf6c23c6c1aca9d899a58e884bbaaffd6
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 5959f7fcf6c23c6c1aca9d899a58e884bbaaffd6
Author: Balazs Gibizer <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Sep 2 16:37:55 2015 +0200

    Fix the help text of monkey_patch config param
    
    The help text of monkey_patch config param was misleading as it
    referred to logging but the code used this param to turn on the whole
    monkey patching in nova.
    
    DocImpact
    
    Change-Id: Ie1700ca5ab781354eda7e88577423a8f0b21f264
    Closes-Bug: #1491446
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: This issue was fixed in the openstack/nova 13.0.0.0b1 development milestone.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx
